attributes.action: Open up and investigate what was signed in the Good Friday Agreement in 1998
attributes.additional_details:
The government should revisit the legality of the Good Friday Agreement and either have it amended to include British soldiers or completely scrap it.
British soldiers who deployed on Operational Banner have been sacrificed for far to long for political gain by politicians and it needs to stop.
attributes.background: The government needs to open up the documents that were signed by Tony Blair on behalf of the UK Government, the Veterans community have continued to be sacrificed for political gain and it’s time to have them included into the agreement or to scrap it altogether.
